citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 noon on
06/03/2014.
Licensee was reached by phone but did not have anyone available to conduct an inspection for several hours.

narrative:
2.126                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 noon on
06/03/2014.  
Licensee was reached by phone but did not have anyone available to conduct an inspection for several hours.
